OldVersion.description: Utilize complex formulas such as XLOOKUP and SUMIF to create formula columns bringing together data from multiple tables.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel Copilot supports generating multiple formula columns from a single prompt
CurrentVersion.description: Users can ask Copilot to generate multiple formula columns suggestions at once, from a single prompt, such as "split the name into first name and last name."

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel Copilot supports generating multiple formula columns from a single prompt
OldVersion.description: Users can ask Copilot to generate multiple formula columns suggestions at once, from a single prompt, such as "split the name into first name and last name."

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

OldVersion.title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Copilot Adoption Community
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing new capabilities in Engage that will help organizations with their M365 Copilot rollout and adoption journey by bringing together employees in a community of practice. This community will provide a place for employees to ask questions, seek support from both their peers and IT admins, share best practices, and learn more from articles and quick tips on how best to use Copilot. This templatized Copilot adoption community will take away much of the work from the community manager with a set-up checklist, suggested content, suggested members (based on Copilot license assignment), and other features like conversation starters and top Q&As to help with community member engagement.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Copilot Adoption Community
OldVersion.description: We are introducing new capabilities in Engage that will help organizations with their M365 Copilot rollout and adoption journey by bringing together employees in a community of practice. This community will provide a place for employees to ask questions, seek support from both their peers and IT admins, share best practices, and learn more from articles and quick tips on how best to use Copilot. This templatized Copilot adoption community will take away much of the work from the community manager with a set-up checklist, suggested content, suggested members (based on Copilot license assignment), and other features like conversation starters and top Q&As to help with community member engagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join Zoom meetings with an ID and passcode from a Teams room on Android
CurrentVersion.description:
Teams Rooms on Android can now join Zoom meetings with an ID and a passcode. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license and your room must be configured to enable Direct Guest Join meetings. Learn about how to enable Teams Rooms devices to join third-party meetings at the link below.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/rooms/third-party-join

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join Zoom meetings with an ID and passcode from a Teams room on Android
OldVersion.description:
Teams Rooms on Android can now join Zoom meetings with an ID and a passcode. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license and your room must be configured to enable Direct Guest Join meetings. Learn about how to enable Teams Rooms devices to join third-party meetings at the link below.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/rooms/third-party-join

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Easily manage Do Not Disturb presence status when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing a setting that allows Teams Phone Mobile users to opt-out of your presence automatically transitioning to Do Not Disturb when presenting or screen sharing. When this setting is enabled, users will be able to continue to receive call notifications when presenting, without having to manually adjust their presence status.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot assisted Loop Page Creation
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborate with copilot to go from a blank page to a structured document ready for collaboration as quickly as possible. Start from scratch, or select an existing page or template as the starting point and Copilot can modify it for the task at hand

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Enhanced multiple action experience from Threat explorer
CurrentVersion.description: SecOps can take multiple actions such as purging emails, submissions, and Tenant-level block actions through a single wizard on the bulk of messages. In addition, Tenant-level block URL and File actions are now available directly from Threat explorer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Enhanced multiple action experience from Threat explorer
OldVersion.description: SecOps can take multiple actions such as purging emails, submissions, and Tenant-level block actions through a single wizard on the bulk of messages. In addition, Tenant-level block URL and File actions are now available directly from Threat explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Enable associated SharePoint sites to be excluded from retention policies after deletion of Modern Group
CurrentVersion.description: If a modern M365 group is deleted, the associated SharePoint has a retention policy, a file with a retention label, or a legal hold, it remains active but orphaned. These sites cannot be excluded from the retention policy after the deletion of the group because of designed modern group scope. The site-level holds are applied when a group is added to a retention policy and the Tenant-level holds are applied when the complete modern group workload is added to a retention policy. Currently, to remove such a hold, the customer has to raise an escalation. With the rollout of this feature, users will be able to exclude the orphaned SPO site from both site-level holds and tenant-level holds as a self-service.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-app feedback experience and policies for Desktop & Web clients
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the Settings menu for “Help & Feedback” and the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience for Teams Desktop & Web clients. Teams Desktop and Web clients will no longer use Microsoft Teams feedback policies for the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience, and instead use the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Draggable Presenter Toolbar while screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing the ability for presenters to freely drag Presenter Toolbar appearing on top of screen while screensharing.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App centric management for app deployment in Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: App centric management for app deployment will introduce a new admin setting to control who in the tenant has specific Teams apps preinstalled. Similar to app assignments, admins will be able to select from three options: 'Deployed to all users', 'Deployed to specific users and groups', or 'Deployed to no users'. This feature replaces the existing Installed apps section of app setup policies and provides admins with the ability to manage app deployment individually. The Installed apps section of app setup policies for existing customers will be migrated to maintain existing admin settings in the tenant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections now available on web
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Connections is now available directly on the browser. All the same functionalities that exist in Teams now also surface directly in the browser, providing a consistent experience with other Viva Modules.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enhancements to the Text web part
CurrentVersion.description: ,New features coming to the Text web part include enhancements to styling/formatting, bullets/numbered lists, and tables.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Decoupling of Policy tips and Email notifications while configuring rules on Data Loss Prevention for Sharepoint and Onedrive
CurrentVersion.description: ,As of today, whenever the user wants to enable email notifications the policy tips also need to be enabled and vice versa, but with this decoupling the admin can configure the following: 1) None of policy tips or email notification 2) Only policy tips 3) Only Email Notifications 4) Both Email Notifications and Policy tips

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, Insider risk management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites.  Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Access: Modern Chart Improvements
CurrentVersion.description: A top ask from customers is to modernize Access charts and to support better data visualization in Access. To satisfy this user request, we are integrating a new charting package called “Ivy” into Access. Ivy is a charting package written by the Office DVX team that is currently used in Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Access: Integrate Monaco framework to improve SQL editor capabilities
CurrentVersion.description: The Monaco Editor is the fully featured code editor from VS Code with standard IDE functionality such as syntax highlighting, IntelliSense, and autocomplete.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Swipe in the Message List on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The Message List will now support Swipe from Left and Swipe from Right actions on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. As a result, some minor organization changes will also happen for the hover actions. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will support Viva Pulse cards where admins can add Pulse cards to the Connections Dashboard. Users of the Connections Dashboard will get notified about Pulse surveys they send and receive, as well as Pulse reports shared with them. Users can also create a Pulse survey from the Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages - Author inline comments
CurrentVersion.description: Author inline comments enables users to collaborate, provide feedback, and track issues within a page or news post.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Image shapes
CurrentVersion.description: ,We're adding the capability to apply a shape over the image web part as well as on inline images in the text web part. Shapes include square, circle, triangle, hexagon, pebble, and teardrop.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Flexible Layouts
CurrentVersion.description: ,New flexible layout sections allow authors to build pages without the strict column structure. Web parts can be dynamically resized and moved within the flexible section.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages - Updated Hero web part with new layout & styles
CurrentVersion.description: The reimagined hero web part will feature a carousel layout and a selection of new styles, creating an eye-catching and engaging experience at the top of the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Disk Encryption with “Bring your own key” support
CurrentVersion.description: ,CloudPC’s can be encrypted using their organizations “bring your own key” if enabledfor their entire Microsoft 365 tenant and meets licensing requirements. This roadmap item is no longer accurate and will be removed from the roadmap in the near future.

OldVersion.title: Windows 365: Disk Encryption with “Bring your own key” support
OldVersion.description: ,CloudPC’s can be encrypted using their organizations “bring your own key” if enabledfor their entire Microsoft 365 tenant and meets licensing requirements.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Ability to target Conditional Access (CA) policies to a single application that applies to both the Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop apps
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop share a common framework for identity access by using Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) and security controls with CA policies. You can target CA policies to the Windows 365 app and this applies only to windows365.microsoft.com web client. To apply CA policies to the full Windows client and non-windows clients, you must assign CA policies to both the Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop apps. This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer applicable.

OldVersion.title: Windows 365: Ability to target Conditional Access (CA) policies to a single application that applies to both the Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop apps
OldVersion.description: Currently, Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop share a common framework for identity access by using Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) and security controls with CA policies. You can target CA policies to the Windows 365 app and this applies only to windows365.microsoft.com web client. To apply CA policies to the full Windows client and non-windows clients, you must assign CA policies to both the Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop apps. This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer applicable.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated notifications experience in Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: We've updated notifications to make it easier for you to effectively customize your settings so you can stay on top of the things that matter to you and be able to maintain a healthy work-life balance.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Updated notifications experience in Mobile
OldVersion.description: We've updated notifications to make it easier for you to effectively customize your settings so you can stay on top of the things that matter to you and be able to maintain a healthy work-life balance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis. Note: The status and release month has been updated to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
OldVersion.description:
,
Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting ID and passcode to join on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT Admins can configure and require a meeting ID and passcode to join a meeting on Teams Rooms on Windows to ensure higher levels of security and privacy. This feature is available for Teams Rooms Pro customers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Edit and Delete events support for messages in user: Bot chats
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, message events can be accessed by developers. This feature allows developers to access, edit or delete event updates on messages in user:bot chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting recordings will be saved to meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business
CurrentVersion.description: With this change Teams meeting recordings will be saved to the meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business instead of to the OneDrive for Business folder of the person who initiated the recording. This improves the compliance of recordings as meeting organizers can then manage access permissions and recording file management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage who can record and transcribe meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Who can record’ control for meeting organizers to include transcription. With this change, meeting organizers with a Teams Premium license will see a control called ‘Who can record and transcribe’ in the meeting options, which allows meeting organizers to select from two options: (1) organizers and co-organizers, or (2) organizers, co-organizers, and presenters. This control allows meeting organizers to manage which roles are able to initiate recording and transcription for a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Utilization insight reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,Cloud PC performance low utilization report will surface all Cloud PCs that never had any user login.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Admin defined maintenance windows for actions impacting end users and without causing any disruption to users
CurrentVersion.description: A service scheduled recurring default maintenance window to perform general maintenance activities with least disruption to the end-user. This roadmap item is no longer accurate and will be removed from the roadmap in the near future.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Web client enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enhancements for the Windows 365 web client to improve and optimize Cloud PC experiences for end-users running the environment in the browser. This roadmap item is no longer accurate and will be removed from the roadmap in the near future.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Downsizing a Cloud PC (Direct Assigned Licenses)
CurrentVersion.description: ,An administrator will have the ability to downsize a user's Cloud PC, provided that the admin has licenses in inventory to perform the downgrade. Only available for direct assigned licenses. Downsizing is only supported for vCPU/RAM – not storage. This roadmap item is no longer accurate and will be removed from the roadmap in the near future.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Resize Cloud PCs for Group Based Licensing
CurrentVersion.description: ,An administrator will have the ability to resize Cloud PCs of users who are licensed via Group Based Licensing. Administrators will be able to resize multiple Cloud PCs at once. This will work for upgrades as well as downgrades.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic application updates for new Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description: In the quest to deliver low-friction deployment and proactive management for Microsoft Teams Rooms, the Microsoft Teams Rooms for Windows app now automatically checks for, and installs, new application and Windows updates during the initial setup process, ensuring devices are protected and up to date on day one.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Video Pages
CurrentVersion.description: Create video centric page content, like highlighting meeting content or executive messages with the new video pages templates - presenting them inline, playable, and beautiful. These templates are available in both SharePoint and Stream, making it easy to showcase video with a customized and branded pages experience from either application.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New SharePoint Start
CurrentVersion.description: New SharePoint start experience aims to inspire content creators to use their platform. By emphasizing a user-friendly approach that minimizes clicks, it's now easier to create websites, pages, news, and intranet content. Creators can return to the start experience hub to refine drafts, review past work, and monitor engagement metrics

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Content Pane for SharePoint Pages and News.
CurrentVersion.description: The content pane surfaces relevant authoring tools that help authors quickly browse and add content to SharePoint pages. With this new feature, authors can easily drag and drop web parts, media, and section templates for creating rich and engaging pages.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: SMS on Outlook Lite
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Available only in India. Outlook Lite now presents a modern, powerful SMS experience for users who prefer to have all their messaging needs in one compact platform/

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pre-pin meeting apps via Admin Policy in the Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now pre-pin meetings apps for users (much like personal apps and messaging extensions) in the Teams admin center

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Follow a meeting in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Follow is a new meeting response (RSVP) option that goes beyond the traditional Accept, Tentative and Decline choices geared towards individuals with high meeting loads and conflicting meetings each day. Follow is the ideal RSVP option for meetings you can't attend but still want to stay engaged and receive info about. Other attendees will be able to see if you are following a meeting. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Increased synergy between webapp and Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to easily switch within Viva Learning Teams app and Webapp.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting protection support on Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Rooms on Android devices apply the Teams Premium meeting security features including end-to-end encryption and sensitivity labels if the meeting organizer has them turned on.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified channel creation
CurrentVersion.description: We added the option to create a channel directly from the + button in the Teams app, making it easier for the user to create a channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified team create
CurrentVersion.description: When creating a team, the new default experience will be ‘create a team from scratch’, making it a simpler and quicker experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights Attribute clones
CurrentVersion.description: New logic allows analysts to build on or combine existing organizational attributes. For instance, a new org attribute that combines several roles that can then be used to filter results in the analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Cross-region disaster recovery (BCDR)
CurrentVersion.description: Windows 365's cross-region BCDR capability will enable customers to achieve greater data resilience by maintaining additional geographically diverse copies of their Cloud PCs. This includes the ability to recover Cloud PC instances, along with user context (optional), in the event of an Azure full region outage. We are targeting a private preview by the end of 2023. This roadmap item is no longer accurate and will be removed from the roadmap in the near future.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: GCC and GCC High resize support
CurrentVersion.description: The resize feature allows admins to seamlessly upgrade or downgrade users’ existing Cloud PC resources (vCPU/RAM/Storage) via license switch. This capability is now being extended to GCC/GCCH as well as customers on FedRamp. We are targeting the preview by end of 2023. This roadmap item is no longer accurate and will be removed from the roadmap in the near future.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Community Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: ,Updates to community analytics will allow community admins to better understand engagement trends, reach and the top conversations that occur within their communities.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Administrator to control one-way clipboard redirection
CurrentVersion.description: Enables admin to control copy/paste unidirectionally for providing more secure data access. This roadmap item is no longer accurate and will be removed from the roadmap in the near future.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Synced updates for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android devices and paired consoles.
CurrentVersion.description: When Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android devices are updated from the Teams Admin Center, their paired consoles will get updated in tandem, ensuring a seamless experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity labels to protect Microsoft Teams shared channels
CurrentVersion.description: Sensitivity labels will protect Microsoft Teams shared controls with sharing and discovery controls. Note: The release phase and rollout start month have been updated to show current status. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: The new Outlook for Windows - Offline support for mail actions and compose
CurrentVersion.description: The first set of offline capabilities in the new Outlook for Windows. Mail, calendar events, and contacts will be stored on your device, so you can view them even when you're not connected to the internet. Additionally, you can perform key actions on your mail, including flag, move, and delete, and compose messages, to stay productive even when you're not connected to the internet.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line
CurrentVersion.description: With private line, users will be able to have a private second phone number that they can make available to a select set of callers to call them directly, bypassing delegates, admins, or assistants. Inbound calls to the private line will be distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone. The private line will support incoming calls only. Note: We have updated the cloud instances to reflect the current state. We will create a new roadmap with a new timeline when available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour for Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour for Viva Engage private messages and community conversations, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour for Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour for Viva Engage private messages and community conversations, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. Note: We have updated the clouds to reflect the current state.  Gov clouds will be forthcoming later during Q4 of this calendar year.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Last used date inside Tenant Allow Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Tenant allow block list domains & addresses, URL, and file entries will show last used date. This helps admins understand when an entry was last used (either at mailflow or time of click), helping them remove entries which are no longer needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated Outlook for iOS Settings
CurrentVersion.description: The whole Outlook for iOS Settings page is being updated to be better organized so that you can find the settings you need more efficiently.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Meeting Option and Meeting Policy "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" is a new meeting option that gives meeting organizer the option to disable copying and sharing features on meeting chat messages for participants in order to reduce the risk of data leak. Once this restriction is enabled, meeting chat participants will not be able to copy chat messages using menu option or keyboard shortcut, forward messages or share messages to Outlook. There is also a new Meeting Policy setting in Teams admin center for admin to control whether user can see or use this feature in Meeting Options page. Admin can also set the default value for this meeting option in Meeting Templates they create.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Advanced Video Analytics for Clipchamp Premium
CurrentVersion.description: We are building the next set of analytics features that would help video creators to better understand the audience and video viewing patterns. These features would be available as a part of the Clipchamp Premium license. Views by geolocation: Geolocation shows the views of the video as a percentage of total views from different countries over the last 7 days, 30 days, and 90 days. Usage by devices: This metric shows the views of the video as a percentage of total views from different devices (desktop, mobile, etc.) over the last 7 days, 30 days, and 90 days. Average watch time: It represents the total playback minutes of a video across multiple sessions divided by unique sessions. It reflects the average time spent by a user while watching the video over its lifetime. Note: To better align our features with customer needs, the Microsoft Stream advanced video analytics feature has been canceled to prioritize other key areas of development.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
CurrentVersion.description: With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: In-Person Event
CurrentVersion.description: New option during event creation in Outlook will allow organizer to request invitees to attend the event in person. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web. #newoutlookforwindows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting Chat shown by default in Gallery View for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting Chat is now shown by default when joining a Teams meeting with Teams Rooms on Windows in Gallery View, making it easier to see incoming chat messages on the front of room display. IT Admins can configure the default chat experience for a room, and users can make in-meeting changes to show or hide the chat using the touch console.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tenant-wide policy for permission to download meeting transcripts and user-level controls for who can view and edit meeting transcripts
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a new control for IT administrators to restrict permissions for the download of meeting transcript files (stored in OneDrive for Business) for any users within the tenant. This policy applies to new meeting transcripts across the entire organization. Administrators can exempt people who are members of specified security groups from the policy. This allows admins to specify governance or compliance specialists who should have download access to meeting transcripts. We are also updating the default permissions so that even when the policy is not applied only transcript owners (recording initiator or meeting organizer) will have permission to download or delete the transcript file, while meeting participants can only view the transcript in Teams app or Stream. In addition to the tenant-wide policy for download permission, the meeting organizer will be able to select in Stream which participants are restricted from downloading, viewing, and editing the transcript in Stream.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improvements to the view, download, and delete experience of Teams meeting transcript files
CurrentVersion.description: We are streamlining the storage of meeting transcript files. Starting with this feature, all meeting transcript entry points in Teams app will point to the OneDrive for Business copy only. The rollout of this feature also improves the delete experience of the transcript for meeting organizers. Now, when a meeting organizer or co-organizer deletes the transcript in the Microsoft Teams app, this will delete both copies of the transcript (from OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online) at the same time. If the meeting organizer deletes the transcript from Stream, only the copy in OneDrive for Business will be deleted. At the same time, meeting transcripts will stop saving in Exchange Online altogether and all transcript storage will be standardized on OneDrive for Business.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improvements to the view, download, and delete experience of Teams meeting transcript files
CurrentVersion.description: We are streamlining the storage of meeting transcript files. Starting with this feature, all meeting transcript entry points in Teams app will point to the OneDrive for Business copy only. The rollout of this feature also improves the delete experience of the transcript for meeting organizers. Now, when a meeting organizer or co-organizer deletes the transcript in the Microsoft Teams app, this will delete both copies of the transcript (from OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online) at the same time. If the meeting organizer deletes the transcript from Stream, only the copy in OneDrive for Business will be deleted. At the same time, meeting transcripts will stop saving in Exchange Online altogether and all transcript storage will be standardized on OneDrive for Business.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Comment filtering
CurrentVersion.description: Enable filtering capabilities for the comment pane.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Add links to content in featured set
CurrentVersion.description: Global administrators/knowledge administrators can now add links to content sets in Viva Learning. These links can direct users to content stored internally with services like SharePoint and Stream or found online through YouTube, Vimeo, and other sources. The capability to add links to content allows admins to add content found online to featured sets, in addition to formal learning courses from connected providers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Enriched Data Loss Prevention Alert Email Notifications for DLP Admins
CurrentVersion.description: ,There is now increased information in the alert email notification sent to the Data Loss Prevention (DLP) admin upon a DLP policy match. Previously a DLP alert email only included the user activity and the type of sensitive information matched in the alert. Now, DLP admins will get additional context such as alert ID, policy details, device details, and more. This will help admins quickly assess the priority of an alert and determine the next steps before navigating to the Microsoft Purview DLP alerts page or Microsoft 365 Defender DLP alerts page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: ,Copilot in Viva Learning will act as a virtual learning companion, assisting users throughout their learning journey and providing personalized guidance, recommendations, and the ability to take actions. Users will be able to leverage Copilot to preview and consume courses from Copilot’s search results, create learning collections in a single click, and see highly relevant search results by asking questions in natural language. Copilot will be visible to users on the Home page, My Learning tab, course details pages, and on Academies.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Schedule from email with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: ,Often you may want to transition a conversation from an email thread to a meeting. Copilot helps you do this by being able to start scheduling right from the email conversation. It saves you time and effort by generating a meeting invite that's ready for you to review and send. When you click on "Schedule with Copilot" a meeting form will appear with a Copilot generated meeting title, agenda, and conversation summary as well as a pre-filled attendee list from the email thread and an attachment of the original email thread. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, web, Mac, and mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot for Sales plugin for Copilot in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can enable the Copilot for Sales plugin in the plugin menu. All plugins are toggled ‘off’ by default, and users can toggle it ‘on’ from the plugin menu. When Copilot for Sales plugin is set to ‘on,’ Copilot in Teams meetings will be able to access Sales and Dynamics 365 data to return insights for a summary of the sales opportunity for the meeting based on the transcript, as well as retrieve brand information for the account from Dynamics 365 if the account name was mentioned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Improved issue details for service health
CurrentVersion.description:
We are introducing a new version of the service health issue details pane (the surface that appears when you click on a service incident or service advisory to view details).

The new version substantially reduces the amount of duplicated text and brings key information forward with improved formatting.  This gives you quicker access to the information you need, reducing the time and effort required to get up to speed on service incident details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create themes for SharePoint and Viva Connections in brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to experience the enhanced share functionality in Viva Goals and provide access as they share with their team. Note: The release phase and date have been updated to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Create themes for SharePoint in brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Customize your individual sites and experiences with fonts and themes
CurrentVersion.description: Site owners will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Site-level video analytics dashboard
CurrentVersion.description:
,This dashboard gives access to aggregated analytics for videos on a SharePoint site. This feature will go live in late January for customers enrolled in the private preview of Stream advanced video analytics. Customers interested in applying to join the private preview may submit an application via the URL associated with this roadmap item. We expect the dashboard to enter general availability in June. The metrics on this dashboard are divided into the following sections: First, the Lifetime Video report contains 3 metrics for videos on the SharePoint site—Total Views, Unique Viewers, and Average Watch Rate. Second, Video Traffic report shows views and viewer patterns across the last 7 days, 30 days, and 90 days. Third, Video Usage shows views by device and geolocation. Fourth, Top 20 Videos shows a list of the most popular videos on the SharePoint site in the last week. Note: To better align our features with customer needs, the Microsoft Stream advanced video analytics feature has been canceled to prioritize other key areas of development.
More info: https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=v4j5cvGGr0GRqy180BHbRxtVxJyO0BFOoG0pvqGnDONUM0dCQU9LMkpUUkkwWU9FR0NORUVNTExJSy4u

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with commercial data protection
CurrentVersion.description: A new product usage report will be added in the Microsoft 365 admin center providing insights into active usage of Microsoft Copilot with commercial data protection. The report will include total active users, average daily active users, and active users per platform (i.e. Bing, Edge, Windows, copilot.microsoft.com, and Copilot mobile app). Usage insights can be viewed as totals and trends for the past 7, 30, 90 or 180-day periods. The report will also show the last activity date per user, anonymized by default.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Section Background
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint now allows you to add an image or gradient color to the sections of the page from a new set of options, including image settings to ensure readability. With this release, we're providing authors to make beautiful pages with featured sections.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Loop components in OneNote
CurrentVersion.description: ,Tap into the real-time, online collaborative solution provided by Loop directly within the powerful multimodal OneNote canvas—the opportunities are endless. You can create or insert Loop components into your OneNote notebook. Navigate to Insert > Loop to create a new component or try pasting a link to an existing component to have it show up in your OneNote canvas.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: Bookings in GCC High and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Bookings will be available to customers in GCC High and DoD environments.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can upload custom background images on the Teams admin center to reinforce their company brand on their Teams Rooms devices. The main room display, extended room display, and touch console can each have its own specific background image. PNG, JPG, and JPEG, formats are supported. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Zero Touch Provisioning of Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description: Zero touch provisioning is a feature that allows you to deploy Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows devices without any physical intervention at the site. It leverages Windows Autopilot and auto-login technologies to automate the enrollment and configuration of the devices from the cloud, using the credentials stored in the Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management. With Zero touch provisioning, you can reduce the deployment time and cost and improve the security and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to change language on Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users can change the default app language on Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows by tapping "More" and then "Language" on the room console. Admins can select up to three languages that users can pick from in the room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 4K display UI scaling for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: 4K-enabled displays, including front of room displays and touch boards, are natively supported on the Teams Rooms experience. Additional disclosure: 4K video is not supported.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: new Teams is now part of Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The new Teams app is now supported on Teams Rooms on Windows, allowing all Teams Rooms devices to optimize room experience and render intelligent audio and video more reliably.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: User reported events in Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management
CurrentVersion.description: When an end user reports an issue from a Teams Rooms device, a feedback event is raised in the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal. This event provides managers with the necessary data to act on the feedback or open a support case with logs that were generated by the end user. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings with a QR code on Teams Rooms on Windows using Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Users can quickly join a meeting from a Teams Room even without forwarding the invite to the room calendar by scanning a QR code using their native mobile camera. The user will then enter the Teams mobile companion mode experience on their mobile. The QR code is found on the Teams Room home screen and can also be scanned to start an ad-hoc meeting or cast content from their mobile to the Teams Room display. If the user does not have the Teams mobile app, they will be directed to download it after scanning the QR code. IT admins can control the QR code feature in the device settings and the Teams admin center. This feature supports cross-tenant meetings when the organization settings and user policies allow it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows within File Chiclet
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to run instant workflows and create new file workflows via the file chiclet overflow menu (...)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows within File Chiclet
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to run instant workflows and create new file workflows via the file chiclet overflow menu (...)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Customization and preview of email notifications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention end-user email notification is getting advanced customization options: 1. Extensive Token Support which provides precise details to end users using the expanded token library. 2. DLP Exchange rule matched email attachment control to choose to include/exclude matched email as an attachment in end-user notifications. 3. Tailored Email Content to customize the sender display name and email body using HTML, markdown, or plain text. 4. Ability to preview the email notification to ensure it meets your requirements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for webinars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Short meeting URL
CurrentVersion.description: We are making meeting URL shorter and removing unnecessary symbols/info from there to make it more convenient for sharing

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Media node in OneDrive for Web
CurrentVersion.description: We're adding a Media node to the left nav of OneDrive for Web which will allow commercial customers to easily find all the photo and video content stored in their OneDrive in a single view.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Answers Intelligent Importer
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to upload documents and use AI to generate question and answer pairs from that content within Answers and communities on Engage for premium users. Answers Intelligent Importer aims to transform static to dynamic, fostering active engagement and interactive conversations. This approach also facilitates the easy retrieval and reuse of generated answers, preventing them from getting lost within the depths of a document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quicker sign in without entering the domain name
CurrentVersion.description: Users can skip typing the full user principal name (UPN) and sign in faster on shared and managed devices, by using app configuration policies to autofill the domain name.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for town hall
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for town halls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: macOS Platform SSO Support
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enable logging in on a managed Mac using your Entra ID password.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multi-panel check-in on Teams panels
CurrentVersion.description: If a conference room has multiple panels deployed, admins can now enable check-in and room release for this room. The devices will stay in sync on the check-in status to ensure that the room is released or not released correctly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Plugins in copilot.microsoft.com
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can now use plugins via copilot.microsoft.com to expand Copilot skills.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Multi-tenant communities and campaigns in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Viva Engage is bringing support to enable multi-tenant organizations to have a seamless experience with Campaigns and Communities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Multi-tenant Events and AMA in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Enable hosting of Cross-tenant AMAs and Events with Viva Engage

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot with graph grounded chat in the Microsoft 365 mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 mobile app users with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license will be able to receive answers grounded in their organizational graph data.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Mobile – In-app Contact Editor
CurrentVersion.description: This update implements a new contact editor experience, replacing the use of the native device experience. This gives users the ability to create and edit their contacts with a 1st Party form in Outlook mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town Hall Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams town hall Graph APIs allow users to create, update, and delete town hall events.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Open a Teams Meeting chat
CurrentVersion.description: For meetings that are created as Teams Meetings, users now have the option to open the Teams Meeting chat directly from the meeting event on their Outlook mobile calendar. Selecting that option will open the chat in Teams or tell the user to get the Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Microsoft Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting details displayed on pre-join screen
CurrentVersion.description: Available for in-tenant participants, the meeting pre-join screen will now include contextual information about the meeting like meeting title, scheduled start time, scheduled end time, and number of participants who have joined the call.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Desktop Shortcut for New Enterprise Devices
CurrentVersion.description: For new enterprise devices, including Windows Enterprise SKUs, Windows Server SKUs and any domain-joined or AAD-joined devices, running through Windows Out of Box Experience (OOBE) for the first time will see a Microsoft Edge desktop shortcut automatically created. When enterprise users turn on their Windows 11 devices for the first time, they'll see the Edge shortcut on their desktop.  This desktop shortcut provides users with an alternative way to access their Microsoft Edge browser without needing to manually pin and configure their set-up.For new enterprise devices, including Windows Enterprise SKUs, Windows Server SKUs and any domain-joined or AAD-joined devices, running through Windows Out of Box Experience (OOBE) for the first time will see a Microsoft Edge desktop shortcut automatically created. When enterprise users turn on their Windows 11 devices for the first time, they'll see the Edge shortcut on their desktop.  This desktop shortcut provides users with an alternative way to access their Microsoft Edge browser without needing to manually pin and configure their set-up.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Interact with Copilot in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Interact with Copilot in Outlook, ask questions, or provide instructions directly inside Outlook. Users can type and receive responses from Copilot in a right-hand side panel that can be opened by the user by clicking on the Copilot icon in the top nav bar. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Chat support to generate a SWOT analysis
CurrentVersion.description: Users can ask for a SWOT analysis or pro/con list of a document or topic that will analyze their document and bring in relevant enterprise and web context to inform the derived analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
CurrentVersion.description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document, rather than operating in large part against the entire document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can generate quizzes from provided materials
CurrentVersion.description: Generating quizzes from provided materials is one of the most commonly requested features in the education industry, and it is now available in Forms. To save time, users can create quizzes from documents, textbooks, or notes using Copilot. Copilot can create draft quizzes based on the provided materials and users' prompts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Explicit consent for transcription in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: The meeting policy that requires explicit consent to be recorded is expanding to include transcription. When the policy is applied, a notification will pop-up when the recording or transcription is initiated requesting consent of all participants to be transcribed and recorded. Before a user gives consent, the user cannot unmute, turn on camera or share content in the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Enhancements to the DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: Mac DLP will have the following capabilities with these enhancements: Context Based Classification and Matched condition and short evidence for advanced classification.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Enhancements to the DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: Mac DLP will have the following capabilities with these enhancements: Context Based Classification and Matched condition and short evidence for advanced classification.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
CurrentVersion.description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document, rather than operating in large part against the entire document

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Workspaces now supports adding highlighting
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Edge Workspaces users are now able to collaborate in a synchronized way by adding highlighting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant Allow Block list in GCC, GCCH, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: All the Tenant Allow/Block functionality as present in WW environment will be available to admins and security analyst of GCC, GCCH, and DoD.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Updated submission results
CurrentVersion.description: Administrators and security operators will see updated results from submissions. These updates remove any confusion they might have with the current submission result.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel support for complex formula columns from multiple tables
CurrentVersion.description: Utilize complex formulas such as XLOOKUP and SUMIF to create formula columns bringing together data from multiple tables.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel Copilot supports generating multiple formula columns from a single prompt
CurrentVersion.description: Users can ask Copilot to generate multiple formula columns suggestions at once, from a single prompt, such as "split the name into first name and last name."

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Copilot Adoption Community
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing new capabilities in Engage that will help organizations with their M365 Copilot rollout and adoption journey by bringing together employees in a community of practice. This community will provide a place for employees to ask questions, seek support from both their peers and IT admins, share best practices, and learn more from articles and quick tips on how best to use Copilot. This templatized Copilot adoption community will take away much of the work from the community manager with a set-up checklist, suggested content, suggested members (based on Copilot license assignment), and other features like conversation starters and top Q&As to help with community member engagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join Zoom meetings with an ID and passcode from a Teams room on Android
CurrentVersion.description:
Teams Rooms on Android can now join Zoom meetings with an ID and a passcode. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license and your room must be configured to enable Direct Guest Join meetings. Learn about how to enable Teams Rooms devices to join third-party meetings at the link below.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/rooms/third-party-join

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Easily manage Do Not Disturb presence status when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing a setting that allows Teams Phone Mobile users to opt-out of your presence automatically transitioning to Do Not Disturb when presenting or screen sharing. When this setting is enabled, users will be able to continue to receive call notifications when presenting, without having to manually adjust their presence status.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Easily manage Do Not Disturb presence status when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing a setting that allows Teams Phone Mobile users to opt-out of your presence automatically transitioning to Do Not Disturb when presenting or screen sharing. When this setting is enabled, users will be able to continue to receive call notifications when presenting, without having to manually adjust their presence status.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot assisted Loop Page Creation
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborate with copilot to go from a blank page to a structured document ready for collaboration as quickly as possible. Start from scratch, or select an existing page or template as the starting point and Copilot can modify it for the task at hand

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Enhanced multiple action experience from Threat explorer
CurrentVersion.description: SecOps can take multiple actions such as purging emails, submissions, and Tenant-level block actions through a single wizard on the bulk of messages. In addition, Tenant-level block URL and File actions are now available directly from Threat explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Enable associated SharePoint sites to be excluded from retention policies after deletion of Modern Group
CurrentVersion.description: If a modern M365 group is deleted, the associated SharePoint has a retention policy, a file with a retention label, or a legal hold, it remains active but orphaned. These sites cannot be excluded from the retention policy after the deletion of the group because of designed modern group scope. The site-level holds are applied when a group is added to a retention policy and the Tenant-level holds are applied when the complete modern group workload is added to a retention policy. Currently, to remove such a hold, the customer has to raise an escalation. With the rollout of this feature, users will be able to exclude the orphaned SPO site from both site-level holds and tenant-level holds as a self-service.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-app feedback experience and policies for Desktop & Web clients
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the Settings menu for “Help & Feedback” and the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience for Teams Desktop & Web clients. Teams Desktop and Web clients will no longer use Microsoft Teams feedback policies for the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience, and instead use the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-app feedback experience and policies for Desktop & Web clients
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the Settings menu for “Help & Feedback” and the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience for Teams Desktop & Web clients. Teams Desktop and Web clients will no longer use Microsoft Teams feedback policies for the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience, and instead use the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Draggable Presenter Toolbar while screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing the ability for presenters to freely drag Presenter Toolbar appearing on top of screen while screensharing.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Draggable Presenter Toolbar while screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing the ability for presenters to freely drag Presenter Toolbar appearing on top of screen while screensharing.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App centric management for app deployment in Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: App centric management for app deployment will introduce a new admin setting to control who in the tenant has specific Teams apps preinstalled. Similar to app assignments, admins will be able to select from three options: 'Deployed to all users', 'Deployed to specific users and groups', or 'Deployed to no users'. This feature replaces the existing Installed apps section of app setup policies and provides admins with the ability to manage app deployment individually. The Installed apps section of app setup policies for existing customers will be migrated to maintain existing admin settings in the tenant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections now available on web
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Connections is now available directly on the browser. All the same functionalities that exist in Teams now also surface directly in the browser, providing a consistent experience with other Viva Modules.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enhancements to the Text web part
CurrentVersion.description: ,New features coming to the Text web part include enhancements to styling/formatting, bullets/numbered lists, and tables.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Decoupling of Policy tips and Email notifications while configuring rules on Data Loss Prevention for Sharepoint and Onedrive
CurrentVersion.description: ,As of today, whenever the user wants to enable email notifications the policy tips also need to be enabled and vice versa, but with this decoupling the admin can configure the following: 1) None of policy tips or email notification 2) Only policy tips 3) Only Email Notifications 4) Both Email Notifications and Policy tips

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, Insider risk management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites.  Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Access: Modern Chart Improvements
CurrentVersion.description: A top ask from customers is to modernize Access charts and to support better data visualization in Access. To satisfy this user request, we are integrating a new charting package called “Ivy” into Access. Ivy is a charting package written by the Office DVX team that is currently used in Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Access: Integrate Monaco framework to improve SQL editor capabilities
CurrentVersion.description: The Monaco Editor is the fully featured code editor from VS Code with standard IDE functionality such as syntax highlighting, IntelliSense, and autocomplete.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Swipe in the Message List on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The Message List will now support Swipe from Left and Swipe from Right actions on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. As a result, some minor organization changes will also happen for the hover actions. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will support Viva Pulse cards where admins can add Pulse cards to the Connections Dashboard. Users of the Connections Dashboard will get notified about Pulse surveys they send and receive, as well as Pulse reports shared with them. Users can also create a Pulse survey from the Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages - Author inline comments
CurrentVersion.description: Author inline comments enables users to collaborate, provide feedback, and track issues within a page or news post.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Image shapes
CurrentVersion.description: ,We're adding the capability to apply a shape over the image web part as well as on inline images in the text web part. Shapes include square, circle, triangle, hexagon, pebble, and teardrop.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Flexible Layouts
CurrentVersion.description: ,New flexible layout sections allow authors to build pages without the strict column structure. Web parts can be dynamically resized and moved within the flexible section.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages - Updated Hero web part with new layout & styles
CurrentVersion.description: The reimagined hero web part will feature a carousel layout and a selection of new styles, creating an eye-catching and engaging experience at the top of the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Disk Encryption with “Bring your own key” support
CurrentVersion.description: ,CloudPC’s can be encrypted using their organizations “bring your own key” if enabledfor their entire Microsoft 365 tenant and meets licensing requirements. This roadmap item is no longer accurate and will be removed from the roadmap in the near future.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Ability to target Conditional Access (CA) policies to a single application that applies to both the Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop apps
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop share a common framework for identity access by using Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) and security controls with CA policies. You can target CA policies to the Windows 365 app and this applies only to windows365.microsoft.com web client. To apply CA policies to the full Windows client and non-windows clients, you must assign CA policies to both the Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop apps. This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer applicable.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated notifications experience in Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: We've updated notifications to make it easier for you to effectively customize your settings so you can stay on top of the things that matter to you and be able to maintain a healthy work-life balance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis. Note: The status and release month has been updated to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
